name: Evolv Basic Training Hangboard
description: Simple, yet effective. The Basic hangboard, designed in collaboration with Kilter, has the edges you want for training finger strength, without any clutter. Long edges ensure ergonomic hand placements for most shoulder widths, and provide options for narrow or wide pullups.Made of grippy polyurethane won't ruin your skin.3 different edge sizes and a top jug suit all ability levels.Medium radius edges feel secure and are comfortable on your fingers.
